content: You are good at finding the object in a 3D scene based on a given query description.

These images show different views of a room. You need to find the doors in this query description: "there are two large wooden doors. the doors are a golden wooden color with large dark handles.". 
Please review all view images to find the target object and select the view that you can see the target object most clearly. 
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys: 
"reasoning": Explain how you identified the target object, and why you choose this view.
"view": The number of the view is in the top left corner of the corresponding image. e.g., "view": "2"

The target object is described as two large wooden doors with a golden wooden color and large dark handles. In view 1, there are two prominent wooden doors visible on the left side of the image. These doors match the description with their golden wooden color and the presence of large dark handles. The other views do not show the doors as clearly or prominently as view 1.

Here is the annotated image of the selected view. 
All objects belonging to the doors class is labeled by a unique number (ID) in red color on it.
Please select the object ID that best matches the given query description: "there are two large wooden doors. the doors are a golden wooden color with large dark handles.".
Carefully analyze the specified conditions (such as shape, color, relative position with surrounding objects) in the given query, then select top-5 best-matched object IDs.
The selected top-5 object IDs should be sorted in descending order of confidence.
The object ID should be chosen from this list [0, 4, 9, 20, 27, 28, 33, 36, 37, 53, 54, 57]
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys: 
"reasoning": Explain how you identified and ranked the top-5 target object IDs.
"object_id": A list of5 selected target object IDs. e.g., [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

The query describes two large wooden doors with a golden color and large dark handles. In the image, object ID 0 is a large door with a wooden appearance, fitting the description of being golden in color. It also appears to have dark handles, matching the query. Object ID 27 is another door that seems to have a wooden texture, but it is less prominent than ID 0. Object ID 20 is adjacent to ID 0 and might be part of a double door setup. Object ID 36 is near ID 20 and could also be part of a door structure. Object ID 9 is another possibility, though it appears less likely to match the description as closely as the others.
